Series.Actors: |Richard Dean Anderson|Michael Shanks|Amanda Tapping|Don S. Davis|Gary Jones|Colin Cunningham|Julian Sands|Morena Baccarin|Tim Guinee|Anna-Louise Plowman|Vince Crestejo|Peter Williams|Cliff Simon|David Hewlett|Robert Picardo|Carmen Argenziano|Teryl Rothery|Claudia Black|Tony Amendola|Christopher Judge|Ben Browder|Corin Nemec|Beau Bridges|
Series.Overview: This sequel to the 1994 movie Stargate chronicles the further adventures of SGC (Stargate Command). It turned out that the Goa'uld Ra was only one of many alien System Lords who used the Stargates to conquer much of the universe. When Earth uncovers a working cartouche to decipher the coding system of their own Stargate, they find they can now travel anywhere. Earth's military sends out SG teams to explore new planets, find technology, and oppose the Goa'uld. Jack O'Neill and Daniel Jackson from the original movie are part of SG-1. They are joined by Sam Carter, a scientist, and Teal'c, a Jaffa who is convinced the Goa'uld are not gods.

Episode.Overview: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

Episode.EpisodeName: From Stargate To Atlantis - A Sci-Fi Lowdown
Episode.Overview: The Sci-Fi Channel debuted the behind-the-scenes special "From Stargate to Atlantis: A Sci-Fi Lowdown" on July 5, 2004. With great anticipation for the July 9 premiere of of Stargate SG-1's eighth season and the July 16 world premiere of Stargate Atlantis, GateWorld presents these Atlantis preview shots from the special! The images include the first good look at the "puddle jumper" ship, an outer space Stargate in orbit of a planet, a Pegasus galaxy D.H.D., the male Wraith, and more.

The SCI FI Channel previewed the second half of Stargate SG-1 Season Eight and Stargate Atlantis Season One in the behind-the-scenes "Lowdown" special, "Behind the Stargate: Secrets Revealed!" The 1-hour special.

Episode.GuestStars: |James R. Baker Jr|Robert C. Cooper|John Janovy Jr|Christopher Judge|Lawrence Krauss|Robin Murphy|Ian Stewart|Amanda Tapping|Kevin Warwick|Brad Wright|
Episode.Overview: Amanda Tapping takes us on a fascinating look at how many aspects surrounding SG-1 have a basis in real science.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Dean Anderson|
Episode.Overview: The 200th episode of the venerated sci-fi series is discussed during this special.

Episode.GuestStars: |Julian Sands|Morena Baccarin|Tim Guinee|Matthew Walker|Sarah Strange|Greg Anderson|Currie Graham|
Episode.Overview: As SG-1 searches for an Ancient artifact which they hope can defeat the armies of the Ori, they learn more Ori ships are about to be sent through the Supergate to launch a final assault on Earth. Daniel discovers that the artifact, the Ark of Truth, may be in the Ori home galaxy, and SG-1 embarks aboard the Odyssey to find it, and pre-empt the attack. The IOA has a plan of their own and SG-1 ends up in a distant galaxy fighting two powerful enemies.

Episode.GuestStars: Peter Williams (Apophis)
Episode.Overview: While SG-1 attends the execution of Ba'al, the last of the Goa'uld System Lords, Teal'c and Vala inexplicably disappear into thin air. Carter, Daniel and Mitchell race back to a world where history has been changed: the Stargate program has been erased from the timeline. As they try to convince the authorities what's happened, a fleet of Goa'uld motherships arrives in orbit, led by Ba'al, his queen, Qetesh (Vala), and his first prime, Teal'c. SG-1 must find the Stargate and set things right before the world is enslaved by the Goa'uld.

Episode.EpisodeName: Behind The Mythology of Stargate SG-1
Episode.Overview: This special deals with how the SG-1 series intertwined many of Earth's mythologies into its plots and story lines, and about the many alien character connections with Earth’s great mythological figures.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jay Acovone|Vaitiare Bandera|Robert Wisden|Brent Stait|Alexis Cruz|J. B. Bivens|Rick Ravanello|Rachel Hayward|Stephen Sumner|John Bear Curtis|John Tierney|Colin Lawrence|Garvin Cross|Anthony Ashbee|Eric Schneider|Andrew McIlwaine|Santo Lombardo|Sean Amsi
Episode.Overview: When powerful aliens come through Earth's Stargate, Colonel Jack O'Neill returns to Abydos to retrieve Daniel Jackson, who has discovered that the alien transit system includes much more than the two planets.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brent Stait|Robert Wisden|Anthony Ashbee|Alexis Cruz|Andrew McIlwaine|Eric Schneider|Santo Lombardo|Vaitiare Bandera|Stephen Sumner|Garvin Cross|Colin Lawrence|John Tierney|Monique Rusu|Rachel Hayward|Sean Amsing|John Bear Curtis|Adam Harrington|Jay Acov
Episode.Overview: Colonel O'Neill, leading the new SG-1, track Apophis back to the planet Chulak to rescue Sha're and Skaara, and befriend one of Apophis' Jaffa guards.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kevin McNulty|Alan Rachins|Warren Takeuchi|Jay Acovone|
Episode.Overview: Major Kawalsky is possessed by a Goa'uld, and the SGC must find a way to remove it without killing him.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Jorgito Vargas|Soon-Teck Oh|Crystal Lo|Marilyn Chin|
Episode.Overview: An alien civilization is forced to reconsider their views on women when Carter rebels against their social customs.

Episode.GuestStars: |Steve Makaj|Gerard Plunkett|Danny Wattley|Roxana Philip|
Episode.Overview: Members of SG-1 become infected with an alien virus that turns them into primitive beings. Dr. Fraiser must find a cure to save the team and the alien population from whom it was contracted.

Episode.GuestStars: |Roger R. Cross|William Russ|Adrian Hughes|Zahf Hajee|D. Neil Mark|Darcy Laurie|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must stop a renegade Stargate commander, who has gone mad and set himself up as a god on an alien planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Harley Jane Kozak|Kyle Graham|Wally Dalton|Jane Spence|
Episode.Overview: During an off-world assignment, Jack is struck down by energy from a blue crystal... which creates a duplicate of him that returns to Earth in Jack's place.

Episode.GuestStars: |Armin Shimerman|Ray Xifo|Frida Betrani|Terry David Mulligan|Addison Ridge|Michasa Armstrong|Zoran Vukelic|
Episode.Overview: Pressed by the government to acquire new technologies, SG-1 is led to a world inhabited by a seemingly primative race. When Apophis arrives, SG-1 ambush him with disasterous consequences.

Episode.GuestStars: |Bobbie Phillips|Harrison Coe|Gabrielle Miller|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers a race of attractive people who age extremely rapidly. The situation becomes personal when O'Neill begins to suffer from the same accelerated aging, and must live out the rest of his life on the planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |James Earl Jones|Galyn Gorg|Tamsin Kelsey|Vincent Hammond|Mark Gibbon|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground cage designed by the Asgard to protect an alien world from the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elizabeth Hoffman|Keene Curtis|Duncan Fraser|Nancy McClure|Paul McGillion|Sheela Megill|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 tracks down Catherine Langford's fiance, who took the first Stargate trip in 1945, and discovers an ancient meeting hall that may hold the secrets of the universe itself.

Episode.GuestStars: |Salli Richardson|Bob Wilde|Brian Jensen|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c returns to Chulak to stop his people from implanting his son with a larval Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gerard Plunkett|Eric Schneider|
Episode.Overview: Daniel is taken captive by an alien with a hidden agenda, while SG-1 is made to believe he is dead.

Episode.GuestStars: |Suanne Braun|Tracy Westerholm|Amanda O'Leary|David Hurtubise|
Episode.Overview: The banished Goa'uld Hathor is found in an ancient sarcophagus Earth, and takes over the S.G.C. with hopes of raising a new army against the System Lords.

Episode.GuestStars: |Katie Stuart|Kevin McNulty|
Episode.Overview: A mysterious affliction wipes out the entire population of a planet, plus an SG team -- except for one young girl. Carter befriends her, but learns that she is being used by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |David McNally|Paulina Gillis|Christine Jastrzembska|Michasa Armstrong|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c must stand trial for a crime committed while he served as first prime of Apophis when a villager on an alien world identifies him as the Jaffa who killed his father.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tracy Westerholm|Gerard Plunkett|Tobin Bell|Frida Betrani|Garwin Sanford|Woody Jeffreys|
Episode.Overview: The SG-1 team rescues a group of advanced humans from a planet near destruction, and must find a new home for the refugees before the Pentagon gets their hands on them.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tracy Westerholm|Gerard Plunkett|Tobin Bell|Frida Betrani|Garwin Sanford|Woody Jeffreys|
Episode.Overview: Colonel O'Neill and Captain Carter are separated from Jackson and Teal'c during a Stargate journey, and are trapped on a desolate ice world with no way of escape.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dan Shea|Jay Brazeau|
Episode.Overview: The members of SG-1 arrive on P3X-989 and are knocked unconscious. They wake up and return to Earth only to find that they are not quite themselves.

Episode.EpisodeName: There But For the Grace of God
Episode.GuestStars: |Elizabeth Hoffman|Stuart O'Connell|Michael Kopsa|
Episode.Overview: An alien artifact transports Daniel to an alternate reality, where he is not a part of the Stargate program and the Goa'uld -- led by Teal'c -- are invading Earth.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Wisden|
Episode.Overview: Senator Kinsey arrives at the SGC to investigate the program and determine whether the great drain on the U.S. budget is worthwhile, prompting the team to recall missions from the past year.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alexis Cruz|Brent Stait|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 escapes through the Stargate before it is shut down, and learns that Daniel's alternate reality vision is true: Apophis is moving to attack Earth from above. The team must stop Apophis and his son, Klorel, who inhabits the body of their friend Skaara.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Wisden|Alexis Cruz|Bernie Neufeld|Phillip Mitchell|Michael Brynjolfson|Douglas Arthurs|Laara Sadiq|
Episode.Overview: With SG-1 trapped on Klorel's ship, it seems that Earth is doomed as the Pyramid Ships prepare to destroy Earth.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter LaCroix|Judy Norton|Katie Stuart|Tracy Westerholm|Joe Pascual|Ian Robinson|Benz Antoine|
Episode.Overview: Carter is possessed by a Goa'uld who claims to be an enemy of the System Lords.

Episode.GuestStars: |Judy Norton|Tracy Westerholm|Laara Sadiq|Michael Puttonen|Colin Lawrence|Andrew Wheeler|Mark Acheson|Bonnie Bartlett|Nicole Rudell|Woody Jeffreys|Jim Thorburn|David Allan Pearson|Reg Tupper|David Bloom|Kim Kondrashoff|Colleen Winton|Ian Robison|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is put on trial and exiled to a prison world, where a woman maintains a strange control over her fellow prisoners.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Duncan|Dwight Schultz|Jay Acovone|Lisa Bunting|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is imprisoned in a virtual reality realm and forced to relive the worst moments of their lives over and over.

Episode.GuestStars: |Heather Hanson|Gary Jones|George Touliatos|Andrew Guy|Michael Philip|Jason Calder|Roy Prendergast|
Episode.Overview: Jackson becomes addicted to the effects of a Goa'uld sarcophagus, and falls for the planet's manipulative princess.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tamsin Kelsey|Andrew Kavadas|Mark Gibbon|Douglas Arthurs|Andrew Kavadas|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 returns to Cimmeria, and finds that without protection from the Asgard the planet has been invaded by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tobias Mehler|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers an ancient artifact that takes O'Neill and the S.G.C. hostage.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brook Susan Parker|Peter Bryant|Laara Sadiq|Jan Frandsen|
Episode.Overview: The SG-1 team attempt to rescue Teal'c's son, who has been kidnapped and brainwashed by Apophis. Teal'c learns disturbing news about his wife.

Episode.GuestStars: |Vaitiare Bandera|Douglas Arthurs|Chris Owens|Erick Avari|
Episode.Overview: Jackson discovers that his wife has returned to Abydos, and is nine months pregnant with the son of Apophis. O'Neill must keep the secret of the Stargate program from being uncovered.

Episode.GuestStars: |Scott Hylands|Colleen Rennison|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c is infected with deadly venom from a giant insect, and begins a terrible transformation. When he escapes the S.G.C., SG-1 must find him before Colonel Maybourne does.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sarah Douglas|Winston Rekert|Steve Makaj|Tosca Baggoo|Stephen Tibbetts|Roger Haskett|Laara Sadiq|Joy Coghill|Carmen Argenziano|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 locates the Tok'ra, a Goa'uld resistence movement who oppose the System Lords, and attempt to form an alliance. Jacob Carter's cancer brings him near death.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sarah Douglas|Steve Makaj|Tosca Baggoo|Winston Rekert|Joy Coghill|
Episode.Overview: While SG-1 tries to form an alliance with the Tok'ra, a spy betrays the rebels to the Goa'uld. Jacob Carter finds that the Tok'ra may be his only hope of survival

Episode.GuestStars: |Rodney A. Grant|Leonard George|Byron Chief-Moon|Jason Calders|Laara Sadiq|Alex Zahara|Christina Cox|Kevin McNulty|Roger R. Cross|Rodney A. Grant|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 finds a planet inhabited by Native American Indians, protected by spirits who are actually advanced alien shapeshifters.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tiffany Knight|Eric Breker|Conan Graham|Matthew Walker|Jerry Masserman|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is accused of stealing an important weather-controlling device, sending a primative planet into chaos. The team discovers that Earth's second Stargate is being misused.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tobias Mehler|David Adams|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill becomes the unwilling receptacle for a library of alien knowledge.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tobias Mehler|Marshall Teague|Kurt Max Rurte|Biskki Gugusher|Jim Thorburn|
Episode.Overview: After gating to a world on the edge of a black hole, the S.G.C. cannot disengage the Stargate. All of Earth becomes endangered by the time-distorting gravity field.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Shanks|Alvin Sanders|Melanie Skehar|Darryl Scheetar|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers an elderly man known for developing technology to fight the Goa'uld. Daniel is tricked into switching bodies with the man, Ma'chello, who believes he is "owed" for all the good he has done.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tobias Mehler|Peter LaCroix|
Episode.Overview: Apophis, SG-1's greatest enemy, seeks sanctuary from Sokar and ends up near death in the S.G.C. infirmiry.

Episode.GuestStars: |Colin Heath|David Cameron|Shaun Phillips|Richard DeKlerk|
Episode.Overview: A group of primitive aliens begin to fall deathly ill after SG-1 arrives.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jeff Gulka|Peter DeLuise|
Episode.Overview: A young boy arrives through the Stargate, and warns of plot by invisible aliens to kill all of the human race in order to rob the Goa'uld of potential hosts.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alex Zahara|Amber Rothwell|Pamela Perry|Glynis Davies|Fred Henderson|Sean Campbell|Efosa Otuomagie|Aaron Pearl|
Episode.Overview: A cosmic accident causes SG-1 to be sent back 30 years into Earth's past, where they must locate the Stargate and find a way home.

Episode.GuestStars: |Suanne Braun|Tom Butler|Samantha Ferris|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill, Carter and Jackson awaken from stasis in what appears to be the S.G.C. -- almost 80 years in the future.

Episode.GuestStars: |Suanne Braun|Samantha Ferris|Tom Butler|Tony Amendola|Kelly Dean Sereda|Oliver Svensson-Tan|Alicia Thorgrimsson|Steve Makaj|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill, Carter and Jackson must escape Hathor's clutches, while Teal'c tries to raise a Jaffa army on Chulak. General Hammond must take desperate measures to rescue the team.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rob Morton|Stuart O'Connell|Lucia Walters|Greg Michaels|Robert Duncan|Mitchell Kosterman|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must find a renegade Goa'uld who has been hiding on Earth for thousands of years.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jacqueline Samuda|Ron Halder|Laara Sadiq|Michael David Simms|
Episode.Overview: The Asgard aid Earth in negotiating a nonagression treaty with the Goa'uld System Lords.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Shanks|Kevin McNulty|Eric Schneider|
Episode.Overview: When Daniel goes insane, SG-1 must deal with the legacy of Machello's anti-Goa'uld technology.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brittney Irvin|Andrew Airlie|Lachlan Murdoch|Stephanie Shea|Diane Stapley|Rob Farrell|Sarah Goodwill|Laara Sadiq|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers a planet where children are used to acquire knowledge for the entire population, then discarded.

Episode.Director: |Peter DeLuise|Jonathan Glassner|Brad Wright|Robert C. Cooper|Tor Alexander Valenza|
Episode.GuestStars: |Tracy Westerholm|Shawn Reis|Jay Acovone|Ty Olsson|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must free an alternate reality Earth from a Goa'uld invasion after duplicates of Samantha Carter and Charles Kawalsky come through the quantum mirror.

Episode.GuestStars: |Mark Holden|Sam J. Jones|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is taken captive by an alien bounty hunter with uncertain loyalties.

Episode.GuestStars: |Laura Mennell|David McNally|Alan C. Peterson|Richard Morwich|John R. Taylor|Christopher Judge|Peter DeLuise|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 finds a medieval Christian society terrorized by Sokar and the Unas, and is accused of being possessed by demons.

Episode.GuestStars: |Aaron Craven|Dion Johnstone|Jesse Moss|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers a military camp where young men are trained to impersonate SGC personnel to infiltrate Earth.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jason Schombing|Erick Avari|Vaitiare Bandera|
Episode.Overview: Jackson deals with the apparent death of his wife, Sha're, at the hands of Teal'c.

Episode.GuestStars: |Megan Leitch|Marya Delver|Jason Gray-Stanford|Luisa Cianni|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure, but SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tanya Reid|Bob Dawson|Dion Johnstone|Peter Kent|David Palffy|Christine Kennedy|Eli Gabay|Dillon Moen|
Episode.Overview: When Major Carter's father Jacob is kidnapped by Sokar, the SG-1 team must infiltrate a prison moon designed to look like hell to rescue him.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tanya Reid|Christine Kennedy|David Palffy|Eli Gabay|William de Vry|Dillon Moen|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must escape a hellish prison moon, and one of their worst enemies.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Leacock|Colin Lawrence|Alex Zahara|Dion Johnstone|Tracy Westerholm|Biski Gucushe|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 returns from a mission and discovers that metamorphic aliens have taken over the complex.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kevin Durand|Alexis Cruz|Frida Betrani|Marie Stillin|Garwin Sanford|Bill Nikolai|
Episode.Overview: The Tollan put Skaara and Klorel on trial to determine who will control the host body.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dom DeLuise|Peter DeLuise|Nickolas Banic|Bill Nikolai|Teryl Rothery|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 receives alien brain implants that manifest themselves as a bizarre man, who tells them that they would not survive the procedure to remove him.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michele Greene|Shane Meier|Julie Patzwald|Marcel Maillard|
Episode.Overview: After a meteor strike buries the Stargate, O'Neill finds himself stranded on a planet with no hope of rescue.

Episode.GuestStars: |Marie Stillin|Christian Bocher|Linnea Sharples|Steve Makaj|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill steals technology from the Tollan, and is forced to leave the Stargate program. Maybourne offers an intriguing proposal.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Ian Cox|
Episode.Overview: The members of SG-1 are imprisoned on a planet and become pawns in a war of ideology.

Episode.GuestStars: |Steve Bacic|Terry Chen|Aaron Douglas|D. Harlan Cutshall|Carla Boudreau|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers the mystical planet Kheb, and must find the Harcesis child of Apophis and Sha're before Apophis's army does.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jan Rubes|Jason Schombing|Russell Roberts|Jacquie Janzen|Tracy Westerholm|Christopher Judge|Jason Schombing|
Episode.Overview: An alien artifact causes Daniel to disappear, and the team looks for help from his institutionalized grandfather.

Episode.GuestStars: |Guyle Lee-Fraizer|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 faces creatures of mass destruction that even the Asgard can't control, and must destroy Thor's infested vessel before the Replicator bugs reach Earth.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dan Shea|Teryl Rothery|Colin Cunningham|Michael Shanks|Gary Jones|Yurij Kis|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Geoff Redknap|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill and Teal'c risk their lives to keep the Replicator bugs from gaining a foothold on Earth, while Carter helps the Asgard fend off a Replicator invasion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rene Auberjonois|Anne Marie Loder|Stephen Park|Kyle Cassie|Kris Keeler|
Episode.Overview: A warring alien race offers to exchange their advanced technology for Earth's help in defeating their enemy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Vanessa Angel|Tracy Westerholm|Shawn Reis|Kristina Copeland|Frank Topol|Bill Nikolai|Laara Sadiq|Daniel Melles|Fraser Aitcheson|
Episode.Overview: A Tok'ra archaeologist arrives at the SGC with newly discovered technology, giving the SG-1 team superhuman powers.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Wingfield|Musetta Vander|Vanessa Angel|Ron Handler|Sean Millington|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c is reunited with his lost love -- a woman who claims to have found a way to communicate with her symbiote and defeat the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kirsten Robek|Andrew Jackson|Vanessa Angel|Phillip Mitchell|
Episode.Overview: When a member of the SGC tries to kill a Tok'ra, it is revealed that O'Neill and Carter may be victims of an untraceable form of Goa'uld mind control.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robin Mossley|Bill Nikolai|Cam Cronin|Peter DeLuise|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill and Teal'c are caught in a time loop in the SGC, and must relive the same 10 hours over and over again.

Episode.GuestStars: |Marina Sirtis|Darryl Scheelar|
Episode.Overview: The Russians recover a Stargate from the bottom of the ocean, and turn to the SGC for help when their experiments go awry.

Episode.GuestStars: |Steve Bacic|Dion Johnstone|Jason Schombing|Rob Lee|
Episode.Overview: Dr. Jackson is taken captive by an Unas while on an archaeological dig. The SGC mounts a rescue operation, but discovers a danger of their own.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alessandro Juliani|Brian Markinson|Rob Court|Nikki Smook|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is caught in a conflict between two civilizations trying to colonize the same planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kim Hawthorne|Alison Matthews|Russell Ferrier|Brian Drummond|Jason Anthony Griffith|Bruce Campbell|
Episode.Overview: The members of SG-1 are used as forced labor in an underground alien facility after their memories are erased by the ruling elite.

Episode.GuestStars: |Willie Garson|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 investigates a conspiracy theorist who has detailed knowledge of the Stargate program.

Episode.GuestStars: |Carmen Argenziano|Steven Williams|Peter Williams|
Episode.Overview: A test gone wrong leaves Jack and Teal'c marooned in space aboard a damaged prototype attack ship

Episode.GuestStars: |Anna-Louise Plowman|Ben Bass|David Abbott|Lorena Gale|
Episode.Overview: When his former mentor dies, Dr. Jackson returns to his roots -- and discovers an ancient Egyptian artifact containing a Goa'uld parasite.

Episode.GuestStars: |Obi Ndefo|Paul Koslo|Douglas Arthurs|Art Kitching|Wren Robertz|Nicholas Harrison|Kyle Hogg|Chris Duggan|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must stop Apophis and Heru-ur from forming an alliance of their powerful forces, while Teal'c is captured and tortured by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Lawrence Dane|Patti Allan|Gina Stockdale|Mark Pawson|Norma Wick|Jacquie Janzen|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must adjust to a new commanding officer when General Hammond steps down -- but O'Neill discovers foul play behind the general's resignation.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ronny Cox|Christopher Cousins|Dion Luther|Bryce Hodgson|Liza Huget|Linnea Johnson|David Neale|
Episode.Overview: Ten years into the future, the former members of SG-1 must send a message into the past to prevent the extinction of the human race.

Episode.GuestStars: |William de Vry|Yee Jee Tso|Lane Gates|Erick Avari|Steven Williams|Jenn Forgie|Barbara Fix|Coleen Christie|June B. Wilde|Michelle Harrison|
Episode.Overview: Jackson's teammates notice a disturbing change in him when he is reunited with the Harcesis child and given the Goa'uld genetic memory.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kristian Ayre|Link Baker|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 finds a deserted Goa'uld palace, where a beautiful device causes suicidal tendencies.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elisabeth Rosen|Michael Kopsa|Hrothgar Mathews|Keith Martin Gordey|Roger Haskett|Russell Farmer|Ivon R. Bartok|General Michael E. Ryan|
Episode.Overview: Carter must help keep a promising young cadet from throwing away a future at the SGC. O'Neill and Teal'c encounter a dangerous life form at an offworld research base.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: The SGC is invaded by an alien life force that takes up residence in the base computer system -- and in Major Carter.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jay Brazeau|Ron Halder|Matthew Harrison|Belinda Waymouth|Bill Croft|Tracy Hway|John DeSantis|Michael Jonsson|Paul Stafford|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must rescue an alien world from the Goa'uld -- with help from an unexpected source. Teal'c seeks revenge on the System Lord Cronus for the murder of his father.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Wingfield|Malik McCall|Kenton Reid|Paul Norman|Kirsten Williamson|Anastasia Bandey|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 helps to evacuate the Tok'ra to a new base -- but matters are complicated when a spy reveals their location to Apophis. The team attempts a daring plan to take out the Goa'uld's powerful fleet.

Episode.Director: |Martin Wood|Paul Mullie|Joseph Mallozzi|Robert C. Cooper|Brad Wright|
Episode.GuestStars: |Carmen Argenziano|Thomas Milburn Jr.|Jennifer Calvert|Dan Shea|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 finds themselves stranded in a crippled ship in a distant galaxy -- with Apophis threatening to destroy them. Teal'c is brainwashed and made loyal to Apophis once again.

Episode.GuestStars: |Eric Schneider|Brook Susan Parker|David Lovgren|Karen Van Blankenstein|
Episode.Overview: His mind altered by Apophis, Teal'c must undergo a ritual that takes him to the edge of death itself, in order for him to rediscover who he is.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ben Wilkinson|Sean Patrick Flanery|John de Lancie|Teryl Rothery|
Episode.Overview: An alien being is smitten with Carter and follows her back to Earth. It assumes a human form and pursues a relationship with her.

Episode.GuestStars: |John de Lancie|Gary Jones|Dion Johnstone|Karen Van Blankenstein|Dario De Iaco|Shawn Stewart|Brad Kelly|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill and Lieutenant Tyler are ambushed by Goa'uld forces and trapped behind enemy lines -- while the rest of their team discover they don't know who Tyler is.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brian Jensen|Fred Applegate|John Prosky|Norman Armour|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers that their recent trip through the Stargate may have inadvertently doomed an entire civilization.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard DeKlerk|Jacqueline Samuda|Colleen Rennison|
Episode.Overview: Cassandra mysteriously falls ill, sending SG-1 back to her home planet -- where they uncover a dark Goa'uld secret.

Episode.GuestStars: |Larry Drake|Dion Johnstone|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers a civilization that uses Unas as slave labor, and attempt to liberate Daniel's friend, Chaka.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alexander Kalugin|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 teams with a Russian unit when one of their Stargate teams goes missing in a mysterious alien ziggurat.

Episode.GuestStars: |Garwin Sanford|Marie Stillin|Peter Wingfield|Ryan Silverman|Gary Davis|
Episode.Overview: The Tollan offer Earth advanced weapons technology, prompting a secret investigation on Tollana -- one that leads to a startling discovery.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dion Luther|Christopher Cousins|Robert Moloney|Howard Siegel|Rob Lee|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 encounters a potential new, technologically advanced ally in the war against the Goa'uld -- though they do not know the Aschen's dark secret.

Episode.GuestStars: |John de Lancie|Frank C. Turner|Bill Marchant|
Episode.Overview: When Carter goes missing, O'Neill teams up with Col. Maybourne again to free her.

Episode.GuestStars: |Willie Garson|Mar Andersons|Peter DeLuise|Michael DeLuise|Jill Teed|Christian Bocher|Benjamin Ratner|Don Thompson|Peter Flemming|Herbert Duncanson|David Sinclair|Kiara Hunter|Laura Drummond|Keath Thome|
Episode.Overview: An alien ship approaches Earth, sending SG-1 to an old friend for some answers -- where they discover that Martin Lloyd has created a TV show about the Stargate program.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elisabeth Rosen|David Kopp|Courtenay J. Stevens|Grace Park|Michael Kopsa|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 trains a team of raw cadets, and Colonel O'Neill is forced to take them into a real-life battle situation when he learns of a possible alien incursion at the SGC.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Hewlett|John de Lancie|Tracy Westerholm|Bill Marchant|Jeff Seymour|Martin Blatz|Ken Phelan|
Episode.Overview: Disaster strikes the Stargate, trapping Teal'c in transit. SG-1 must turn to Russia -- and to their enemies -- for help.

Episode.GuestStars: |Andrew Kavadas|Anna-Louise Plowman|William de Vry|Kevin Durand|Courtenay J. Stevens|Jennifer Calvert|Kwesi Ameyaw|Paul Anthony|Anthony Ulc|Sue Mathew|Simon Hayama|Bonnie Kilroe|Natasha Khade|
Episode.Overview: The Tok'ra war with the Goa'uld escalates, and the rebel faction sends Daniel Jackson to a secret meeting between the System Lords.

Episode.GuestStars: |Anna-Louise Plowman|Natasha Khade|Kevin Durand|William de Vry|Jennifer Calvert|Courtenay J. Stevens|Anthony Ulc|Kwesi Ameyaw|Sue Mathew|Bonnie Kilroe|Paul Anthony|
Episode.Overview: Dr. Jackson's undercover mission to a Goa'uld summit is complicated by the arrival of a surprise guest. The rest of the team face a full-scale invasion of the Tok'ra homeworld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brian Jensen|Greg Anderson|David Bloom|Michael Teigen|Kirsten Williamson|
Episode.Overview: Earth finds itself threatened by something even larger than the Goa'uld when the team learns that an asteroid is on a collision course with the planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Obi Ndefo|Kirby Morrow|Rick Worthy|
Episode.Overview: A charismatic Jaffa leader seeks to forge an alliance between Earth and his rebel followers, winning the allegiance of Teal'c and Bra'tac.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tracy Westerholm|Danielle Nicolet|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 encounters a young woman with the ability to control Replicators, and who may hold the key to the salvation of the Asgard.

Episode.GuestStars: |Carrie Fleming|David Kopp|Shawn Reis|Henry Gibson|Frank Cassini|Christina Cox|Carrie Fleming|Colin Lawrence|Chris Newton|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must turn to a pair of convicted criminals to save a world from annihilation by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Corin Nemec|Kevin McCrae|David Hurtubise|Mel Harris|
Episode.Overview: Daniel Jackson is exposed to a lethal dose of radiation while visiting an alien civilization that is building a weapon of mass destruction.

Episode.GuestStars: |Anna-Louise Plowman|Teryl Rothery|Michael Shanks|P.J. Johal|Shaker Paleja|Martin Sims|Brian Jensen|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 must come to the rescue of their once-powerful allies when the Goa'uld attack a secret Asgard laboratory.

Episode.GuestStars: |Christopher Kennedy|David Hewlett|Tobias Mehler|Carrie Richie|Craig McNair|Ivan Cermak|Aleks Paunovic|Michael Soltis|
Episode.Overview: Tragedy reunites Teal'c with his son, who blames him for the death of his mother. O'Neill and Carter launch a risky plan with untested technology when Earth comes under attack by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dale Hall|Ivan Cermak|Robert Thurston|Robert Clarke|Michael Soltis|Grizz Salzl|Craig McNair|Tobias Mehler|Aleks Paunovic|Gary Chalk|David Hewlett|Christopher Kennedy|
Episode.Overview: Carter must find a way to save Earth from total destruction at the hands of the Goa'uld, who have turned the Stargate into a doomsday bomb. Rya'c joins his father on a mission to destroy the Goa'uld weapon.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter DeLuise|Gerald Wong|John Shaw|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 boards an abandoned Goa'uld mothership that has mysteriously arrived in Earth's orbit, and must escape the doomed vessel when it crashes into the ocean.

Episode.GuestStars: |Bruce Harwood|Venus Terzo|Ona Grauer|Paul Perri|Dorian Harewood|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 investigates the discovery of a woman frozen in the ice in Antarctica, who may be a link to the gate builders. A mysterious disease threatens to kill everyone at the research base.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dave 'Squatch' Ward|Blu Mankuma|Peter DeLuise|Vincent Gale|Sean Tyson|Michael Eklund|Peter Anderson|Scott Moneil|Carin Moffat|Christie Wilkes|Adrian Holmes|
Episode.Overview: Carter, Teal'c and Jonas investigate the death of a scientist with connections to the Goa'uld, and find a small town whose citizens harbor a dark secret.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Shanks|Dorian Harewood|Ulla Fris|Patrick Gallagher|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill is captured and tortured by the Goa'uld, and must rely on an old friend to survive.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dean Stockwell|Gillian Barber|Joel Swetow|Doug Abrahams|Rob Daly|Paul Schiele|Susie Wickstead|Jason Calder|Jonathan Kralt|
Episode.Overview: Jonas' people ask Earth for military aide in an impending war with their rival nations, but his former mentor offers another solution: a resistance movement ready for a coup.

Episode.GuestStars: |Martin Sims|Randy Schooley|Michael Daingerfield|Patrick McKenna|John Billingsley|Adam Harrington|
Episode.Overview: When SG-1 is captured by the Goa'uld, a pair of scientists mount a rescue operation ... whether they're wanted or not.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Stebbings|Kimani Ray Smith|Herbert Duncanson|Dan Payne|Obi Ndefo|Link Baker|Rob Lee|Jonathan Kralt|
Episode.Overview: Tensions rise between the Tok'ra and rebel Jaffa at the S.G.C.'s offworld base when they are attacked by an invisible enemy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Stebbings|Allison Hossack|Gwynyth Walsh|Daryl Shuttleworth|Malcolm Stewart|Trever Havixbeck|Andrew Moxham|
Episode.Overview: An alien world offers Earth a medicine with the power to cure any illness -- but the hidden price may be too high to pay.

Episode.GuestStars: |Colby Johannson|Todd Hann|Kyle Cassie|Catherine Lough Haggquist|Jason Gaffney|Bill Marchant|Enid-Raye Adams|Ian Tracey|George Wyner|Kendall Cross|John de Lancie|
Episode.Overview: A news reporter threatens to expose a top-secret military project, but when Carter and Jonas give her a tour of the X-303, they discover that she is a pawn in a much larger plot.

Episode.GuestStars: |Kristina Copeland|Tahmoh Penikett|Rebecca Robbins|Shannon Powell|Ian Buchanan|G. Patrick Currie|
Episode.Overview: The team is called into battle unexpectedly when the Asgard homeworld is overrun by Replicators -- which have evolved into a startling new form.

Episode.GuestStars: |Betty Linde|Michael Karl Richards|Raimund Stamm|Jennifer Steede|Jacob Chaos|Brad Dryborough|Jacquie Janzen|Jody Raicot|Katina Robillard|
Episode.Overview: The team returns to Earth with a piece of technology that allows them to see alien creatures everywhere, and must attempt to contain the problem when it spreads beyond the base.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jon Cuthbert|Peter Flemming|Peter Kelamis|John Mann|Mi-Jung Lee|Chris Harrison|Simon Egan|Daniel Pepper|Yvonne Myers|Darryl Scheeler|L. Harvey Gold|Don MacKay|Dale Wilson|James Michalopoulos|
Episode.Overview: Colonel O'Neill is charged with the murder of Senator Kinsey, and the rest of the team must uncover a conspiracy in order to clear his name.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tom McBeath|Bill Dow|Dan Shea|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: Colonel O'Neill is trapped on an alien planet with Maybourne, and must fight to stay alive as his companion becomes increasingly paranoid.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jacqueline Samuda|Alex Rae|Jaquie Janzen|Dan Payne|Alex Zahara|Dion Johnstone|Raoul Ganeev|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 attempts to save a planet's inhabitants from Nirrti's genetic experimentation, but find themselves to be her next victims.

Episode.GuestStars: |Martin Evans|Paul Batten|Olga Tot|Francois Chau|
Episode.Overview: General Hammond and the Pentagon reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments, and must defend the fact that the program is operated by the United States military.

Episode.GuestStars: |Martin Cummins|Bruce Dawson|David Paetkau|Sarah Deakins|Dion Johnstone|Rob Lee|
Episode.Overview: When the team finds a crashed ship on another planet, their efforts to help the crew effect repairs are hindered by a group of aliens.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Amendola|John Ulmer|Michael Shanks|Musetta Vander|Gianna Patton|Peter Williams|Allan Kovacs|
Episode.Overview: A near-death trial causes Teal'c to imagine his life as very different from the one he knows, where he is a normal person living on Earth -- until he can no longer distinguish reality.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ray Galletti|John Novak|Robert Foxworth|Miguel Fernandes|Ingrid Kavelaars|Alex Diakun|
Episode.Overview: Prometheus is forced to land on an alien world, where the local Stargate is the team's only chance of returning home -- though the local population believe the gate to be a myth.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sarah Edmondson|Johannah Newmarch|Karin Konoval|Karen Van Blankenstein|Brendan McClarty|Thomas Kopache|Victor Talmadge|Tom Schlote|Rob Lee|
Episode.Overview: The team finds an impoverished world enslaved by a Goa'uld underlord, but their plans to free it may be compromised when Jonas experiences unexplained visions of the future.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Shanks|Alexis Cruz|Sean Amsing|Darryl Scheeler|Terrance Leigh|Ahmand Sharmrou|Veeda Sood|Rene Van Hullenbush|Brad Kelley|Mike Roselli|Ernest Jackson|Shawn Stewart|John Ulmer|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is called to defend the people of Abydos from the Goa'uld once again when they learn that Anubis, in search of a powerful device, is about to attack.

Episode.GuestStars: |Corin Nemec|George Touliatos|Kevan Ohtsji|Eric Breker|Raahul Singh|Jonathan Newmarch|Mary-Jane Baker|
Episode.Overview: While searching for the Lost City of the Ancients on a distant planet, SG-1 is stunned to find Daniel Jackson alive and in human form but stripped of his memory. O'Neill convinces Daniel to return with them to the SGC, where he is reinstated for a daring mission to destroy Anubis' powerful new super-weapon!

Episode.GuestStars: |Gillian Barber|Doug Abrahams|Corin Nemec|Kevan Ohtsji|Cliff Simon|Adrian Hough|Glynis Davies|Jan Bos|Daniel Cudmore|Aaron Thompson|
Episode.Overview: The team returns to Jonas' homeworld when they learn that the Goa'uld are after its naquadria. When Jonas is captured by Anubis, Daniel is his only hope.

Episode.GuestStars: |Noah Beggs|Michael Welch|Gregory Bennett|Tom Heaton|Poppi Reiner|Ed Hong-Louie|Theresa Lee|Ralph Alderman|Evan Lendrum|Chris Kramer|Dan Payne|Peter DeLuise|
Episode.Overview: A teenage boy shows up at the S.G.C. claiming to be Jack O'Neill, sending the team on a mission to uncover his true identity.

Episode.GuestStars: |Obi Ndefo|David Richmond-Peck|Sheri Noel|
Episode.Overview: After an injury, Teal'c must put aside his self-doubt when SG-1 launches a mission to rescue his son and his mentor from a Jaffa death camp.

Episode.GuestStars: |Christopher Heyerdahl|Peter LaCroix|Tiffany Knight|Liam Ranger|Wendy Noel|Michael Robinson|Patrick Keating|Finn Michael|
Episode.Overview: The team gates to a climate-controlled environment amidst a toxic wasteland, whose people are all linked to a central computer.

Episode.GuestStars: |James Parks|Gary Jones|Travis Webster|Ryan Drescher|Kimberly Unger|Rob Hayter|Colin Corrigan|Travis Wester|
Episode.Overview: When SG-1 finds a crashed alien space ship, Daniel's mind is taken over by its disembodied passengers.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Rooker|Steven Williams|Alex Zahara|Kavan Smith|G. Patrick Currie|Gary Jones|Michael Shore|Dean Redman|Kirk Caouette|Sean Tyson|Wycliff Hartwig|
Episode.Overview: When Earth's attempts to exploit a newly-discovered naquadah mine are thwarted by a tribe of indigenous Unas, SG-1 must turn to an old friend for help.

Episode.GuestStars: |Scott MacDonald|Alex Zahara|G. Patrick Currie|Terence Kelly|Allan Lysell|Hillary Cooper|Lindsay Maxwell|Nick Masura|Colin Murdock|Peter Kelamis|Ben Ayres|
Episode.Overview: Major Carter joins an alien pilot for a space race, where the winner is awarded a lucrative contract with the planet's most powerful corporation. But the rest of the team discovers that there is more at stake than the finish line.

Episode.GuestStars: |Chris Lozanski|Ron Robinson|Gary Jones|Sylvester Stuart|Paul Lazenby|Tony Morelli|James Michaelopolis|Christopher Sayour|Terrance Morris|Patrick McKenna|Jim Dunn|Terrance Leigh|Jocelyne Loewen|
Episode.Overview: An S.G.C. scientist creates a computer virus to be used to disable enemy Stargates -- but succeeds in shutting down the entire gate network.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nikki Smook|Jolene Blalock|Nigel Vonas|Cory Martin|Kimberly Unger|Julie Hill|Elizabeth Weinstein|Simone Bailly|Christine Adams|Kathleen Duborg|Kirsten Prout|
Episode.Overview: The team finds a fugitive colony of Jaffa women, who must prey on other Jaffa to acquire symbiotes.

Episode.GuestStars: |Frank Roman|Zak Santiago Alam|Sean Whale|Todd Thomson|Eric Breker|Michael Jonsson|Dan Payne|Victor Favrin|Craig Erickson|
Episode.Overview: The team investigates an unstoppable new enemy soldier engineered by Anubis. Dr. Jackson leads a team in search of an alien device in Central America, but gets more than he bargained for.

Episode.GuestStars: |Frank Roman|Zak Santiago Alam|Enrico Colantoni|Victor Favrin|Ian Marsh|Miguel Castillo|Dan Payne|Alex Zahara|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill seeks help from a former comrade to rescue Daniel and Dr. Lee, who have been kidnapped in Central America. Carter, Teal'c and Jacob infiltrate Anubis' super-soldier facility.

Episode.GuestStars: |John Novak|Ingrid Kavelaars|Sasha Embeth Pieterse|Craig Veroni|
Episode.Overview: Carter is injured when the Prometheus is attacked by an unknown ship, and awakens to find herself stranded alone in deep space.

Episode.GuestStars: |Corin Nemec|Bill Nikolai|Emily Holmes|Gillian Barber|Patricia Drake|Julian Christopher|
Episode.Overview: When the Kelownans discover that a massive underground vein of naquadah is being converted into naquadria, Jonas Quinn seeks help from Earth in avoiding the total destruction of his planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Anna-Louise Plowman|Paul Jarrett|
Episode.Overview: Daniel is plagued by dreams of his former girlfriend, who has been taken as a Goa'uld host. Samantha Carter begins a romantic relationship with a detective, from whom she must hide her life at Stargate Command.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sebastian Spence|Dan Payne|Mark Gibbon|Gary Jones|Nels Lennarson|Eric Breker|Sam MacMillan|
Episode.Overview: Earth's secret offworld base is attacked by Anubis' forces, and Major Carter finds herself being hunted by the enemy. General Hammond and Jacob Carter make an unnerving discovery about the Earth-Tok'ra alliance.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ronny Cox|Christopher Redman|Tobias Slezak|David Lewis|Mitchell Kosterman|Ryan W. Smith|Julius Chapple|Christopher Pearce|Adam Baldwin|Saul Rubinek|
Episode.Overview: A film crew arrives to document the work of the S.G.C. for eventual disclosure to the public, but finds that the base's personnel are less than eager to participate.

Episode.GuestStars: |Julius Chapple|Christopher Redman|Tobias Slezak|Mitchell Kosterman|Saul Rubinek|Adam Baldwin|Robert Picardo|Katey Wright|Jim Byrnes|Christopher Pearce|Christopher Seymour|Mike Desabrais|Terrance Morris|Brad Loree|Martin Szlavy|Efosa Otuomagie|Steve McMic
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is called into action while a film crew is documenting the Stargate program, but the S.G.C. comes under investigation after the mission goes terribly wrong.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Flemming|Martin Novotny|Kristen Dalton|Brad Greenquist|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 investigates a secret N.I.D. laboratory, where a ruthless scientist has used cloning technology to create a Goa'uld-human hybrid.

Episode.GuestStars: |Colin Cunningham|William Devane|Jerry Wasserman|Robert Picardo|Ronny Cox|Holly Dignard|Mikka Dargel|James McDaniel|
Episode.Overview: The newly-elected president is debriefed about the Stargate program, and Vice President Kinsey makes a new play for control of the program.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ronny Cox|Jessica Steen|William Devane|Eric Breker|Jason Howell|Jerr Weddell|Igor Morozov|Mark Pawson|Dee Jay Jackson|Ron Blecker|John Prowse|Holly Dignard|Dan Payne|Jason Calder|John MacDonald|John Sampson|Bill Edwards (2)|Bill Stewart|Ed Anders|Ga|
Episode.Overview: O'Neill goes to great lengths to keep the Ancients' knowledge from falling into Goa'uld hands when the team discovers a second repository. The President replaces General Hammond with a civilian diplomat.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jessica Steen|William Devane|Marc Worden|Ronny Cox|James McDaniel|John Jumper|Ingrid Kavelaars|Colleen Winton|John Prowse|Peter Kufluk|Kurt Max Runte|Dan Payne|Finn Michael|
Episode.Overview: Anubis begins a systematic assault on Earth, and the planet's only hope of salvation depends on whether SG-1 can find the Ancients' mythical Lost City.

Episode.GuestStars: |G. Patrick Currie|Torri Higginson|Steve Bacic|Kira Clavell|Kevan Ohtsji|Barclay Hope|Chelah Horsdal|Todd Masters|Adam Behr|Geoff Redknap|Paul Hoosen|Jeny Cassady|Brad Proctor|
Episode.Overview: Carter and Teal'c go in search of the Asgard to try and save Colonel O'Neill, but discover that the Asgard's enemy has returned with a vengeance. The System Lords seek an alliance with Earth against a common enemy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Amanda Tapping|G. Patrick Currie|Torri Higginson|Steve Bacic|Kira Clavell|Todd Masters|Adam Behr|Geoff Redknap|Paul Hoosen|Jeny Cassady|Brad Proctor|Kevan Ohtsji|Barclay Hope|Chelah Horsdal|Michael Shanks|
Episode.Overview: While the Goa'uld threaten to attack Earth, SG-1 and the Asgard make a last, desperate stand against the Replicators, which have captured Major Carter and invaded the last outpost of the Asgard civilization.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gavin Hood|Alisen Down|Aaron Pearl|Holly Ferguson|Arvydas Lebeliunas|
Episode.Overview: The S.G.C. is put under quarantine after a mysterious infection leaves a Russian officer in the infirmary -- but the disease may not be a disease at all.

Episode.GuestStars: |Pierre Bernard|Eric Breker|David Kaufman|Steve Bacic|Michael Ryan|Jesai Jayhmes|James Ashcroft|Ken Kirzinger|
Episode.Overview: General O'Neill tries to settle into his new job, but faces never-ending crises - including the capture of SG-1 by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Side|Amy Sloan|Timothy Webber|Matthew Bennett|James Kidnie|Chris Redmond|Leanne Adachi|Preston Cook|Charles Zuckermann|
Episode.Overview: Daniel is stranded on another planet after the team's arrival on an alien world sparks a violent civil war.

Episode.GuestStars: |Andrew Airlie|Dan Payne|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c is trapped in a virtual reality simulation, in which he must defend the base from a Goa'uld super-soldier incursion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brad Kelly|Christopher Attadia|Lucas Wolf|Judith Berlin|Erica Durance|Sean Millington|Peter Bryant|Adrian Hughes|Kate Mitchell|Brad Sihvon|Rob Hayter|Benita Ha|Michael Rogers|Derek Hamilton|Clay Virtue|
Episode.Overview: Teal'c becomes the chief suspect in a murder investigation after he moves into an apartment off-base. Carter considers her future with Pete.

Episode.GuestStars: |Charles Shaughnessy|Tom O'Brien|Kendall Cross|Chris Shields|Ingrid Torrance|Brad Proctor|Morris Chapdelaine|George Grove|Nicolas Podbrey|Todd Masters|Paul Hoosen|
Episode.Overview: A businessman threatens to expose the secrets of alien life to the world, forcing Stargate Command to bring him into the loop.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jolene Blalock|Jeff Judge|Mercedes De La Zerda|Royston Innes|Gary Jones|Simon Bailey|Noah Danby|Steve Lawlor|Dan Payne|
Episode.Overview: The impending wedding of his son is the least of Teal'c's worries when the Hak'tyl plan an uprising against the Goa'uld Moloc, driving a wedge between Teal'c and Ishta.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ed Anders|Ryan Booth|Chelah Horsdal|Rob Hayter|Barclay Hope|Scott Owen|Benita Ha|Peter Bryant|Lucas Wolf|Gary Jones|Rob Lee|Mark Gibbon|Michael Sorich|Brandy Ledford|Rob Lee|
Episode.Overview: The Stargate is stolen, leading SG-1 to discover that the Trust has taken control of an advanced ship in orbit. Teal'c investigates a series of wide-spread Jaffa deaths.

Episode.GuestStars: |Amanda Tapping|G. Patrick Currie|Gary Jones|Jason Emanuel|Chris Robson|
Episode.Overview: A duplicate of Colonel Carter seeks help from Stargate Command in defeating the Replicator Fifth, who she claims has found a way to counter the Asgard's new weapon.

Episode.GuestStars: |Don S. Davis|Gary Jones|Ellie Harvie|Eric Breker|Morris Chapdelaine|Christoper Pearce|Geoff Redknap|Dan Payne|
Episode.Overview: After the Prometheus responds to a distress call from a Goa'uld ship, Daniel Jackson finds himself a captive when Earth's ship is stolen.

Episode.GuestStars: |Wayne Brady|Tom McBeath|Nancy Sorel|Melanie Blackwell|Robert Bruce|Zak Church|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 comes to the aid of a world about to be invaded by the Goa'uld, only to discover that the local king is Earth's Harry Maybourne.

Episode.GuestStars: |Hiro Kanagawa|Allan Gray|Mike Dopud|Dmitry Chepovetsky|Joey Aresco|Francoise Robertson|Ronny Cox|Lucas Wolf|Barclay Hope|Chelah Horsdal|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: Relations between the U.S. and Russia are strained when Russian military leaders claim that the U.S. government has been compromised by the Goa'uld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Andy Thompson|Mark Hansen|Alex Ferris|Chad Krowchuk|Beatrice Zeilanger|Dan Castellaneta|Deborah Theaker|Louis Chirillo|Eric Keenleyside|
Episode.Overview: Jack is confronted in his home by an irate barber...who claims to know everything about the Stargate project and SG-1.

Episode.GuestStars: |Amanda Tapping|Samantha Banton|Jeff Judge|Dean Aylesworth|Carmen Argenziano|Mel Harris|Isaac Hayes|Kevan Ohtaji|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: The Replicators begin a systematic attack of the Goa'uld, forcing Baal to come to Earth for help. The Jaffa Resistance risk their entire movement in an attempt to retake a holy city in Baal's domain.

Episode.GuestStars: |Amanda Tapping|Jeff Judge|Dean Aylesworth|Carmen Argenziano|Isaac Hayes|Eric Breker|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance as Sam and Jacob search for the only weapon capable of stopping the Replicator onslaught. O'Neill leads a defense of the S.G.C., while Daniel squares off against Replicator Carter.

Episode.GuestStars: |Amanda Tapping|Mel Harris|Carmen Argenziano|Isaac Hayes|Jeff Judge|Rik Kiviaho|Clare Carey|Gary Jones|George Dzundza|
Episode.Overview: While Daniel finds himself in a mysterious diner suspended between death and ascension, Jacob's fate takes an unexpected turn, Jack and Sam consider their romantic lives, and Anubis unleashes his plan for galactic destruction.

Episode.Director: |Peter DeLuise|Joseph Mallozzi|Paul Mullie|Brad Wright|Robert C. Cooper|
Episode.GuestStars: |Don S. Davis|David Hewlett|Robert Wisden|David Lewis|Alessandro Juliani|James Purcell|Georgia Craig|Benjamin Easterday|Neil Schell|Jay Williams|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 travels back in time in a daring plan to steal a piece of Ancient technology from Ra, the powerful Goa'uld who ruled in ancient Egypt.

Episode.Director: |Peter DeLuise|Joseph Mallozzi|Brad Wright|Paul Mullie|Robert C. Cooper|
Episode.GuestStars: |Alessandro Juliani|Jay Acovone|David Hewlett|Don S. Davis|Benjamin Easterday|Sina Najafi|Christopher Pearce|Rob Fournier|
Episode.Overview: With the timeline changed by SG-1's actions in the distant past, an alternate version of SG-1 must use the newly-discovered time ship to set things right.

Episode.GuestStars: |Larry Cedar|Silya Wiggins|Gary Jones|Richard Dean Anderson|Lexa Doig|
Episode.Overview: An Air Force pilot attempts to reassemble SG-1 after they have gone their separate ways. An old "friend" arrives on Earth asking for Daniel's help in finding an ancient treasure -- and she won't take no for an answer.

Episode.GuestStars: |Silya Wiggins|Steve Park|Larry Cedar|April Telek|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: An Ancient communications device renders Daniel and Vala unconscious, sending their minds to another galaxy -- where they inhabit the bodies of two people persecuted by the followers of an evil religion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Larry Cedar|Steve Park|Gary Jones|April Telek|Louis Gossett| Jr.|Richard Dean Anderson|Claudia Black|
Episode.Overview: Daniel comes face to face with the Ori, a fiery race of beings who demand the worship of mortals. Elsewhere, Stargate Command encounters the first Ori missionary in our galaxy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claudia Black|Bruce Gray|Gary Jones|Bill Dow|Wallace Shawn|Lexa Doig|Michael P. Northey|Malcolm Scott|Morris Chapdelaine|
Episode.Overview: Jackson and Mitchell must join Vala on an interplanetary scavenger hunt when they learn that they are still bound together by an alien energy field.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claudia Black|Cam Chai|Gary Jones|Lexa Doig|Greg Anderson|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 visits a world whose people once worshipped Vala as a god -- and demand that she stand trial when she confesses to manipulating them.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claudia Black|Barclay Hope|Gary Jones|Maury Chaykin|Louis Gossett Jr.|Dan Shea|
Episode.Overview: Samantha Carter returns to Stargate Command when the Ori seize control of a planet, using an expanding force field to gain a foothold in our galaxy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cliff Simon|Kendall Cross|Barclay Hope|Gary Jones|Louis Gossett Jr.|Gardiner Millar|Simone Bailly|Kevin Blatch|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 investigates when evidence suggests that there are still Goa'uld hiding on Earth -- including a former System Lord. Tensions between Earth and the Free Jaffa continue to mount.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jason George|Jarvis George|Gary Jones|Tony Todd|Lexa Doig|Bryan Elliot|
Episode.Overview: Colonel Mitchell is injured in a skirmish with a warrior from a mythic tribe of rebel Jaffa, and is trained in their fighting techniques only so that he may engage in a ritual battle to the death.

Episode.GuestStars: |Neil Jackson|Robert Picardo|Gary Jones|Lexa Doig|Ivan Cermak|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 finds a genetically advanced Goa'uld-human hybrid created by Anubis, and returns him to Earth for study. But even keeping him alive may not be worth the risk.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Amendola|Gary Jones|Bill Dow|Thomas Milburn Jr.|Lexa Doig|Louis Gossett| Jr.|Cameron Bright|Don S. Davis|Julian Sands|
Episode.Overview: Earth is infected with a deadly Ori plague, prompting an ally from SG-1's past to come to their aide. Gerak proposes that the Free Jaffa follow the Ori religion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cameron Bright|Don S. Davis|Tony Amendola|Garry Chalk|Gary Jones|Lexa Doig|Louis Gossett Jr.|
Episode.Overview: As the Ori plague spreads rapidly, SG-1 hopes that the Prior who caused the disease may hold the key to its cure. Gerak tries to rally the Jaffa to the Ori's cause, prompting Teal'c and Bra'tac to initiate a resistance.

Episode.GuestStars: |Anna Galvin|Warren Kimmel|Benson Simmonds|Gary Jones|William Atherton|
Episode.Overview: When SG-1 travels to an Asgard Protected Planet, Colonel Mitchell is accused of a murder he did not commit.

Episode.GuestStars: |Teryl Rothery|JR Bourne|Gary Jones|Bill Dow|Lexa Doig|
Episode.Overview: Multiple SG-1s show up at Stargate Command, leading the "real" team to conclude that they have each been inadvertantly displaced from different parallel realities.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Amendola|Cliff Simon|Reed Diamond|Veena Sood|Eric Breker|Gardiner Millar|Simone Bailly|
Episode.Overview: Baal kidnaps Teal'c as part of a plot to brainwash those Jaffa advocating a move toward democracy. Cameron Mitchell learns that an old friend is about to die.

Episode.GuestStars: |John Aylward|Ernie Hudson|Matthew Bennett|Desiree Zurowski|Barclay Hope|Gary Jones|
Episode.Overview: Daniel is imprisoned on a world under the influence of the Ori, and the Prometheus is caught in a firefight when SG-1 tries to rescue him.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cliff Simon|Matthew Glave|Vince Corazza|Eric Steinberg|Gary Jones|Maury Chaykin|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 is captured after a deal with the Lucian Alliance goes bad ... and the planet's Stargate goes missing. Meanwhile, a former System Lord attempts to rebuild his empire.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Picardo|Tamlyn Tomita|Mark Oliver|Andy Maton|Tony Alcantar|
Episode.Overview: A tour of an off-world research base for a group of foreign diplomats turns dangerous when an insidious insect species gets loose.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jarvis George|Doug Wert|Bill Dow|Gary Jones|Eric Breker|Tony Todd|
Episode.Overview: Mitchell and Carter are shifted to another dimension, making them invisible to everyone at the S.G.C. Meanwhile, Teal'c and SG-9 discover that the Sodan have been brutally attacked.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claudia Black|Tim Guinee|Daniella Evangelista|Garry Chalk|Tamlyn Tomita|Michael Ironside|Alex Dafoe|
Episode.Overview: Vala Mal Doran makes contact with Stargate Command from the Ori home galaxy, and tells the story of her life undercover in a village of followers building the Ori's invasion fleet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Claudia Black|John Noble|Katharine Isabelle|Matthew Glave|David Thomson|Eric Steinberg|Gary Chalk|Martin Christopher|Peter DeLuise|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 discovers the village of Camelot on an alien world, and must face Merlin's security system when they go in search of an Ancient weapon. Elsewhere, Earth and its allies assemble a fleet when a working Ori Supergate is discovered.
As the Ori invade the Jaffa planet Chulak, Vala and Daniel must deal with their leader: Vala's young daughter, rapidly aged by the Ori to serve their purposes.
SG-1 investigates a problem off-world and soon finds that they have become victims themselves: they cannot stay awake. Meanwhile, Vala Mal Doran undergoes an evaluation on Earth, hoping to join SG-1.
Daniel and Vala travel to Atlantis in search of Merlin's anti-Ori weapon, while Sam, and Mitchell join forces with Dr. McKay to lock out the Ori supergate.
When Baal comes to Earth seeking help, Stargate Command must capture his clones and determine which one is the genuine article.
Teal'c discovers a world where people are being savagely attacked by an elusive creature, leading SG-1 to a stunning discovery about its potential origin.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Jones|Peter DeLuise|Trevor Devall|Shirley Hill|Jonathan Hill|Julie Johnson|Jason Coleman|Barbara Kottmeier|Cory Monteith|Anwar Hasan|Martin Wood|Herbert Duncanson|Christian Bocher|Jill Teed|Isaac Hayes|Richard Dean Anderson|Don S. Davis|Willie Garso
Episode.Overview: Martin Lloyd seeks out SG-1 for assistance when his failed TV show based on the real Stargate program becomes a feature film.
Episode.Writer: |Paul Mullie|Joseph Mallozzi|Brad Wright|Carl Binder|Martin Gero|Robert C. Cooper|Alan McCullough|

Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Jones|Tony Amendola|Morena Baccarin|Matthew Glave|Martin Christopher|Shiraine Haas|Aleks Holtz|Sylvesta Stuart|David Andrews|Richard Whiten|Peter Nicholas Smyth|
Episode.Overview: The Jaffa take the fight to the Ori, using a genocidal weapon on their new worshipers and landing SG-1 in the middle of a war they can't control.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Jones|Patricia Harras|Peter Benson|Sean Owen Roberts|Brian Davies|Heather Christie|Adrian Holmes|Don Stark|Sonya Salomaa|Brendan Beiser|Phillip Mitchell|
Episode.Overview: Striken with amnesia and on the run, Vala takes a job as a waitress as she tries to piece together who she is and what happened to her.

Episode.GuestStars: |Geoff Redknap|Martin Christopher|Matthew Glave|Eric Steinberg|Gary Jones|Adrien Dorval|Hawthorne James|Michael Rogers|Dean Monroe McKenzie|Joey Aresco|Scott McNeil|Morris Chapdelaine|Sean Campbell|Timothy Paul Perez|Rudolf Martin|
Episode.Overview: Cameron Mitchell must go undercover inside the deadly Lucian Alliance to prevent his teammates from becoming casualties of an Alliance civil war.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cliff Simon|Morena Baccarin|Doug Abrahams|Rod Loomis|Beverley Breuer|Quinn Lord|Kenton Reid|Steve Archer|Stephen Holmes|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 races against Baal in the hunt to find the Sangraal, Merlin's anti-Ori weapon, and comes up against a series of ancient trials.

Episode.GuestStars: |Matthew Walker|Cliff Simon|Morena Baccarin|Doug Abrahams|Steve Archer|
Episode.Overview: When the team finds Merlin himself, they must help him complete the Sangraal weapon before Adria and her Ori forces can track them down.

Episode.GuestStars: |Aisha Hinds|Aaron Craven|Greg Anderson|Sean Tyson|Tim Guinee|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 tries to defend a planet from the Ori by hiding its people in another dimension. Vala attempts to convince her husband Tomin of the Ori's true motives.

Episode.GuestStars: |Michael Chase|Billy Mitchell|Lisa Bayliss|Travis Woloshyn|Robert Mann|Alexander Boynton|Don S. Davis|Kavan Smith|David Hewlett|Kendall Cross|
Episode.Overview: An experiment gone wrong pulls Samantha Carter into a parallel reality, where she must save Earth from an Ori assault before she will be allowed to return home.

Episode.GuestStars: |Robert Picardo|Christopher Gaze|Richard Dean Anderson|
Episode.Overview: When SG-1 discovers that Daniel Jackson has been turned into a Prior of the Ori, they must determine whether or not his plan to destroy the Ori is genuine.

Episode.GuestStars: |Bill Dow|Eric Steinberg|Noah Danby|Anne Marie Loder|David Lovgren|Mike Dopud|Gary Jones|Timothy Paul Perez|Maureen Thomas|Ian Robison|Ryan Elm|Jody Thompson|Mark Brandon|Jeny Cassady|Brad Proctor|Jackie Blackmore|Ed Anders|Rob Boyce|Rob Hayter|
Episode.Overview: When the Lucian Alliance puts a bounty on SG-1's heads, Cameron Mitchell finds himself a target while attending his high school reunion.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sean Allan|Danielle Kremeniuk|Haley Beauchamp|Brent O\'Connor|Joshua Malina|Alistair Abell|Ron Canada|Richard Zeman|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 realizes they have stepped through the gate into another planet's museum -- but are mistaken for a band of zealous rebels who have taken hostages.

Episode.GuestStars: |Craig Fairbrass|John Tench|Megan Elizabeth|Aaron Brooks|Eric Breker|Peter Kent|
Episode.Overview: When a terrorist attack decimates a Jaffa summit Teal'c strikes out on a quest for revenge, believing that the perpetrator is one of his own pupils.

Episode.GuestStars: |Lexa Doig|Bill Dow|Gary Jones|Dan Shea|Fred Willard|Fulvio Cecere|Martin Christopher|Robin Richardson|Doreen Ramus|Lillianne Dieuique-Lee|Paul Wu|
Episode.Overview: Earth provides sanctuary for Vala's estranged, con artist father after he provides intel about a Jaffa plot to attack the planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Flemming|Fulvio Cecere|Jonathan Walker|Eric Breker|Derek Versteeg|Paul Lazenby|Steven Cree Molison|
Episode.Overview: SG-1 hatches an elaborate plan to try and capture Adria, using Vala as bait.

Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Jones|Bruce Woloshyn|Martin Christopher|
Episode.Overview: Trapped on board the Odyssey, the members of SG-1 must live out the rest of their lives together when Carter activates a time dilation field to save the ship from destruction.
